name: City Bird
description:
Help a city bird escape to the Countryside in this short 1-Bit platformer, avoid obstacles and experience the world.

Arrow Keys = Moving Left & Right       Space = Jump

----------

If you enjoy this game please consider Subscribing to my youtube channel.

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7iw7FtpQ84OuT3QC40m9dw

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/borcorosso/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/BorcoRosso

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/borcorosso

TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@borco_rosso?lang=en

----------

This game was made for the 2021 A Game By it's cover Game Jam. Inspired by this fantasy Famicom game I set out and made City Bird in Unity. I haven't used unity in a while, but my programming and general computer skills have improved massively since I last used it and I didn't have that hard of a time. There is a bug where the camera makes the tilemap disappear for a second at the second checkpoint past the elevator that I have no idea how to fix.

Disclaimer: This game is not more important than your baby sister TRENTON
